--- title: "2024 EFSPI regulatory statistics workshop" date: last-modified execute: freeze: auto # re-render only when source changes output: rmarkdown::html_document: highlight: pygments number_sections: yes self_contained: yes toc: no toc_depth: 2 toc_float: yes --- # What's new for the 2024 workshop? - Not new is that we keep the **registration fees at the same decent level**. This eventhough we extend the workshop by half a day, see next item. - We will have a dedicated HTA session on the Friday morning, see [draft program](https://efspieurope.github.io/workshop/data/2024/9th%20EFSPI%20RegStat%20Workshop%20program.pdf). - For the first time we will have a patient talking. # Date and venue of 2024 workshop The workshop will take place 11-13th September 2024 (start morning of 11th and end noon of 13th) again at [Biozentrum](https://www.biozentrum.unibas.ch/) in beautiful [Basel](https://www.basel.com/en).
![](biozentrum.jpg)

[Draft program (status: 5th June 2024)](data/2024/9th EFSPI RegStat Workshop program.pdf) [Registration](https://forms.gle/JWc1ZyUKxq5Lhhwf6) Members of [local organizing committee](local.html). Members of [scientific committee](scicom.html). # Call for short topics Like previous years, it is possible to submit a short topic for discussion with a panel of regulators. Submit your proposal to the Chair, Helle Lynggaard, by sending an e-mail to hlyn@novonordisk.com. Deadline for submissions is 15th August 2024. # Updates to this page and the draft program See [here](updates.html).
